name: Slice of Death
description:
Slice of Death, My Submission for the Extra Credits Game Design Jam. Ride a Sword-Cycle through Hell and find your way home.

Controls:  "spacebar" to jump, and "x" to slash.

I interpreted the theme of "Awesome Per Second" as over-the-top action. When I came up with a motorcycle that was also a sword, I knew I wasn't making anything else. This one's pretty rough around the edges, but it's done. And that's more than I can say for 95% of my projects.

Other than those listed below, all assets are created by me.

The game's font is Good Times by user Raymond Larabie from 1001fonts.com.
Link: https://www.1001fonts.com/good-times-font.html

Enemy Death sound is by user Michel88 from freesound.org.
Link: https://freesound.org/people/Michel88/sounds/76958/

Sword Slash sound is by user fielastro from freesound.org.
Link: https://freesound.org/people/fielastro/sounds/423935/

Explosion sound is by user roper1911 from freesound.org.
Link: https://freesound.org/people/roper1911/sounds/155790/

Engine sound is by user lmbubec from freesound.org.
Link: https://freesound.org/people/lmbubec/sounds/119455/

Music is by Kevin MacLeod of Incompetech, who provides a paste-able credit from his site:
Big Rock Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
